name: Shén Dōu Bùliáng Tàn
storyline:
You will enter the ancient city of Huaxia in the prosperous times, but it is not as peaceful as it seems on the surface.
The wind of the gods is unpredictable, a slight movement may trigger the catastrophe of the gods, Luoyang is suspicious and foggy, and if you pull it, it will stir up the chess game of heaven and earth.
How to distinguish right from wrong, good and evil, loyal and disloyal in the sword, light and shadow?
Every choice you make will change the development of the plot, the direction of history, survival or destruction, all in at your hands.
summary: A full-video interactive video game in which you play as a detective and must solve several burning intrigues. Explore from the first point of view and lead the plot trend to crucial nodes through various interactive forms such as choices, QTE, clue collection and more. After reasoning, gradually get to the truth and let the story develop further.
